name: TanZen - Relaxing tangram puzzles
description:
*** If you're looking for an iPad version, please try TanZen HD. It is designed specifically for the iPad. ***

Find your Zen, with the #1 top selling tangram game on the App Store! Over 550 puzzles!

Choose a puzzle to solve, and try to fit all seven game pieces within the shaded puzzle area without overlapping. TanZen will recognize when the puzzle is finished. Pick up and play for two minutes, or two hours!

Features:
- 567 puzzles, with more to come via updates
- Game Center achievements
- Large, intuitive touch controls
- Solve puzzles in any order
- Hint system
- Optional advanced mode for expert puzzles
- Soothing background music by Atomicon
